channel.title: Bj Fogg on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Bj Fogg on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Grand resolutions vs tiny habits
item.description: BJ Fogg is hosting an online program in which he encourages people to produce three tiny habits that they can learn to do in the span of a week. One of the ones I'm trying to do, for instance, is to take my medicine after the kitchen is clean. That's not a huge task - after all, the medicine cabinet is in the kitchen - but it's one that anchors a little task in a place where I know I can make it happen.
